comments:
I have an intermittently recurring problem when trying to save a manual
testsuite, I get the following error:

An error has happened during the saving attempt.

File:/ManualTestCases/PerfmonTraceMultiCounter.testsuite
Reason:The Object
'org.eclipse.hyades.models.common.interactions.imp.BVRLifelineImpl@8fb561
(id: C87BC5300D5911D880008576D1036C30, description: null, name:
_selfLifeline)'is not contained in a resource.

See log file for further details


This is the relevant logfile details:

This defect appears to have been fixed by another fix, because I am unable to 
reproduce it, and neither is the author of the defect:

> Hi Joe,
?
> I have spent the day trying to recreate the error myself on the latest
> weekly build, without success.

<snip>

> Nathan

Closing the defect as "WORKSFORME"
